channel.title: How To Set Up No-Ip Please Help
channel.description: how do i set up no-ip on rune-evo v3 source please please please helpp im really noob

item.title: How To Set Up No-Ip Please Help
item.dc:creator: @dannymoparscape dannymoparscape
item.description:
@dannymoparscape wrote:

this method doesnt need no-ip duc just do what i said and it will work

  1. port forward
    (canyouseeme.org to check if its open if refused, try it when source is running)
  2. get your ip WAN IP adres at myip.nl
    3 get that ip in client/loader/clientsettings.java (look for one of them)
    4 did you compile?
    5 it should work

grtz

otherwise add me skype danny.overesch :palm:

Read full topic
item.source: How To Set Up No-Ip Please Help

item.title: How To Set Up No-Ip Please Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You donâ€™t set up no-ip to any specific source.
You go on the no-ip site, register, create a nameserver or w/e. Download the DUC program they offer, install it. And then run it/login. Done.

Now you just replace your actual IP with the no-ip running in the DUC.
